original_text: Then you will tell them that the water in the Jordan River stopped where the Lord's Covenant Box was. When the priests carried the Covenant Box into the river, the water stopped. These stones will help the people of Israel to remember this for ever.’
korean_text: 그들에게 이르기를 요단 물이 여호와의 언약궤 앞에서 끊어졌나니 곧 언약궤가 요단을 건널 때에 요단 물이 끊어졌으므로 이 돌들이 이스라엘 자손에게 영원히 기념이 되리라 하라 하니라

sentences.original_text: that the water in the Jordan River stopped
where the Lord's Covenant Box was
When the priests carried the Covenant Box
These stones will help the people of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 이 돌들은 이스라엘 백성을 도울 것입니다
